meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting internal bodily sensations.
meanings.sent1: She had an interoceptive awareness of her heartbeat.
meanings.sent2: The interoceptive signals helped him understand his body better.
meanings.sent3: Feeling interoceptive butterflies in her stomach, she knew she was nervous.
meanings.sent4: His interoceptive connection to his body was like a secret language only he understood.
meanings.sent5: The interoceptive experience of pain was sharp and immediate.

meanings.definition: The process of perceiving internal bodily sensations.
meanings.sent1: Interoceptive involves being aware of your body's signals.
meanings.sent2: She practiced interoceptive to improve her mindfulness.
meanings.sent3: During the interoceptive exercise, he imagined his organs having a party.
meanings.sent4: The interoceptive journey was like exploring a mysterious cave within oneself.
meanings.sent5: The interoceptive exploration revealed a world of sensations within.
